languages.text: "Невежественная мирянка, тебе не обуздать дух сей древней и благородной машины".
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."
languages.original_text: "Невежественная мирянка, тебе не обуздать дух сей древней и благородной машины".

traits.locale_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant laywoman."
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant laywoman."
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant laywoman."
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant laywoman."
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."
"You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

languages.text: "Ihr werdet den Geist dieser uralten und noblen Maschine niemals zähmen, ignoranter Laie."
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet den Geist dieser uralten und noblen Maschine niemals zähmen, ignorante Laiin."

languages.text: « Vous ne dompterez jamais l'esprit de cette noble et antique machine, misérable profane. »
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne dompterez jamais l'esprit de cette noble et antique machine, misérable profane. »

languages.text: “愚昧的外行人啊，你永远别想驯服这台古老、高贵机械中的机魂。”
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: “愚昧的外行人啊，你永远别想驯服这台古老、高贵机械中的机魂。”

languages.text: 「貴様では、この古の高貴なる機械の精霊を飼いならすことは決してできない、無知な素人め」
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様では、この古の高貴なる機械の精霊を飼いならすことは決してできない、無知な俗物よ」

languages.text: «Nunca domarás el espíritu de esta antigua y noble máquina, laica ignorante».
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca domarás el espíritu de esta antigua y noble máquina, laica ignorante».

languages.text: "Cahil avam! Bu kadim ve soylu makinenin ruhuna asla boyun eğdiremezsin."
languages.original_text: "You will never tame the spirit of this ancient and noble machine, ignorant layperson."

traits.locale_text: "Cahil avam! Bu kadim ve soylu makinenin ruhunu dizginlemeyi başaramayacaksın."
